meanings.definition: Relating to a style of writing in which letters are rounded and often written in capital letters.
meanings.sent1: The uncial font on the poster made the text easy to read.
meanings.sent2: The uncial letters in the book were beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent3: The uncial handwriting on the birthday card looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her uncial writing style was as elegant as a swan gliding on water.
meanings.sent5: The uncial script stood out on the page like a bright star in the night sky.

meanings.definition: A manuscript written in uncial script.
meanings.sent1: The historian studied an ancient uncial to learn about the past.
meanings.sent2: The library displayed a rare uncial from the Middle Ages.
meanings.sent3: The uncial manuscript was so old that it crumbled at the touch.
meanings.sent4: The uncial document whispered secrets of bygone eras.
meanings.sent5: The uncial scroll held stories of forgotten civilizations within its delicate pages.
